results.title: Nolan, James - Early Detection Research Network
results.description: James Nolan is a primary admin staff member of the Early Detection Research Network.

results.title: Eshleman, James - Early Detection Research Network
results.description: James Eshleman is a co-investigator of the Early Detection Research Network.

results.title: Herman, James - Early Detection Research Network
results.description: James Herman is a member of the Early Detection Research Network.

results.title: Willey, James - Early Detection Research Network
results.description: James Willey is an associate member of the Early Detection Research Network.

results.title: Buxbaum, James - Early Detection Research Network
results.description: James Buxbaum is an associate member of the Early Detection Research Network.

results.title: DCB - Cancer Systems Biology Consortium - National Cancer Institute
results.description: The CSBC looks at the changing cancer ecosystem, allowing researchers to understand and predict how one alteration effects an entire tumor system.

results.title: Nanotechnology and Early Cancer Detection and Diagnosis - National Cancer Institute
results.description: Winning the battle in cancer is by way of its earlier detection.  Find out here how nanotechnology for cancer can enable the next generation of diagnostics.

results.title: Improved Strategies for Cancer Prevention and Early Detection - National Cancer Institute
results.description: The prevention of cancer and the development of more effective strategies to detect cancer precursors and early stage cancers, when treatment may be most effective, remain critical goals.

results.title: Detecting Cancer Early in Women with Dense Breasts - National Cancer Institute
results.description: Support from NCI’s Small Business Innovation Research program led to the development of LumaGEM, a molecular breast imaging technology. Kristin is convinced that participating in a study testing LumaGEM saved her life.

results.title: Driving New Approaches to Cancer Prevention and Early Detection - National Cancer Institute
results.description: Researchers are pioneering new approaches to preventing and screening for cancer, and the management of very early-stage disease.

results.title: Test Shows Promise for Pancreatic Cancer Early Detection - National Cancer Institute
results.description: A new blood test may accurately detect pancreatic cancer at its earliest stages, when it is most likely to respond to treatment, findings from a new study suggest.

results.title: Hereditary Cancer Prevention and Early Detection - Cancer Moonshot Recommendation - National Cancer Institute
results.description: This Moonshot initiative aims to develop effective cancer prevention and early detection approaches for those at high risk for inherited cancer syndromes and implement appropriate clinical management.

results.title: Research Areas: Detection and Diagnosis - National Cancer Institute
results.description: Accurate information derived from diagnostic tools is critical for making decisions at all stages of cancer care. NCI supports research on the development of tests and imaging technologies that can provide specific information about an individual’s cancer.

results.title: Expand Use of Prevention and Early Detection Strategies - Cancer Moonshot Recommendation - National Cancer Institute
results.description: This initiative aims to develop, test, and adopt proven cancer prevention and early detection approaches to reduce cancer risk and cancer health disparities in all populations.

results.title: Bringing Cancer Research to the Public: NCI’s Networks and Programs - National Cancer Institute
results.description: A number of NCI programs and networks are the foundation of the National Cancer Program and play a critical role in promoting progress.

results.title: Barrett Esophagus Early Detection Study - National Cancer Institute
results.description: A case-control study of Barrett esophagus and potential biomarkers

results.title: The RASopathies Network - National Cancer Institute
results.description: Germline mutations in RAS pathway genes can cause syndromes called RASopathies. The RASopathies Network connects affected families with researchers.

results.title: CRCHD Integrated Networks - National Cancer Institute
results.description: INB supports two network-based programs—the National Outreach Network (NON) and the Geographic Management of Cancer Health Disparities Program (GMaP)—as well as advising on women’s health and sexual and gender minority opportunities within and across the NCI.

results.title: EBV Screening for the Early Detection of Nasopharyngeal Carcinoma - National Cancer Institute
results.description: The Epstein-Barr virus (EBV) Screening for the Early Detection of Nasopharyngeal Carcinoma (NPC) in China demonstration project includes a group of approximately 30,000 men and women ages 35-69 recruited into the active screening arm of a community-randomized trial to evaluate the impact of EBV-based antibody screening

results.title: United States-Latin America Cancer Research Network (US-LA CRN) - National Cancer Institute
results.description: The US–LA CRN was established in 2009 to increase cancer research capacity in Latin America. NCI formalized bilateral agreements with the governments of Argentina, Brazil, Chile, Colombia, Mexico, Peru, Puerto Rico, and Uruguay, to facilitate interactions at the government, institution, and investigator levels.
